list.abs: 辛字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 辛夷〖 lilymagnolia;magnoliawood〗 辛苦〖 pungent;hard;toilsome〗 辛辣〖 pungent;hot;bitter〗.
characterized by toilsome effort to the point of exhaustion ; especially physical effort ., 以辛苦的努力到筋疲力尽为特点 ; 特别是身体上的努力.

RelatedPhrase.word: to have spent toilsome labour and won distinctive merits

list.abs: toilsome I wander ' d Virginia ' s woods ., 劳累时想起弗吉尼亚森林.
